about_short: JavaScript engineer, interested in user experience, efficiency, reverse engineering.
about: I’m a 20 years old tech minded full-stack developer. I am highly motivated and very imaginative by finding inspirations in everyday things, pushing my own boundaries and allowing myself to think out of the box.

projects.title: Localport
projects.desc: Reverse tunnel tool built with web technologies, HTTP2 and QUIC. Can be used for opening ports on strict networks.

projects.title: OWOP Bots
projects.desc: Bots for a web game. reverse engineered and made a custom client for the game.

projects.title: Ice Cream Scoop Counter
projects.desc: Counts how many scoop taken from a ice cream freezer. Object and motion detection algorithms used.

projects.title: Seat Occupancy
projects.desc: Detects empty and full seats in a cinema session. Made with Tensorflow and power of machine learning.

projects.title: Arbitrage
projects.desc: Web scraping, grouping data for same items and comparing differences between items

projects.title: IOS Photos
projects.desc: Clone of ios photos app, on the web
